'''''Палантир''''' (English: ''The Palantír Journal'') is a Russian literary and academic journal published annually by the [[St Petersburg Tolkien Society]].

The journal was founded in [[April]] [[1997]] in [[Wikipedia:Saint Petersburg|St Petersburg]]. It is published annually, usually twice a month in spring and autumn. Since 1997, there were 91 issues.
